content.body: Okay, so for the rest of the room, I believe the first draft of the new proposal text is complete, at <https://github.com/tc39/proposal-pattern-matching/pull/293>. Feel free to review.
content.formatted_body: Okay, so for the rest of the room, I believe the first draft of the new proposal text is complete, at https://github.com/tc39/proposal-pattern-matching/pull/293. Feel free to review.

content.body: I *believe* I've accurately captured champion-group consensus on all points.
